#summary Specification of all tags supported by Ext-Doc
#labels Featured

= 1.0 [ClassTags Class-level] =

  * @class
  * @namespace
  * @extends
  * @singleton
  * @cfg
  * @constructor and @param

= 2.0 [AttributeTags Attribute-level] =

  * @cfg
  * @property and @type
  * @method, @param and @return
  * @event

= 3.0 Other =

 * @ignore
 * @member
 * @static
 * @hide
 * @private
 * @link
